summary: REQ-57 appears implemented by adding a portrait near the top of the Biodata page with appropriate src and English alt text, using responsive Tailwind classes. REQ-56 (adding the actual generated static image file) is not evidenced in the diff summary because no new asset file was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create an optimized, square portrait image asset and add it as a static file at frontend/public/assets/generated/biodata-portrait.dim_512x512.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, and there is no evidence that the required PNG asset was created/committed under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0 (no new static asset file shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/summary files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for adding a static image asset and updating BiodataPage.tsx; it does not request updating project summary/metadata files.
